pinyin: Ma3 ke4 si1 Lie4 ning2 zhu3 yi4

definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia
to arrange/to line up/file/series/(in data tables) column/(Tw) row
abbr. for Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region 寧夏回族自治區|宁夏回族自治区[Ning2 xia4 Hui2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 qu1]/abbr. for Nanjing 南京[Nan2 jing1]/surname Ning
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

sentences.english: Which indeed is approved by Marxism- Leninism?
sentences.chinese: 馬克思列寧主義到底贊成哪一個呢？

sentences.english: The ideas of Marxism-Leninism point the way to victory.
sentences.chinese: 馬克思列寧主義思想指引著通向勝利的道路。

sentences.english: The Chinese people came into contact with Marxism-Leninism after the may Fouth movement.
sentences.chinese: 中國人民在五四運動後開始接觸到馬克思列寧主義。

sentences.english: Marxism- Leninism stands precisely for alliance and co-operation between workers and peasants.
sentences.chinese: 馬克思列寧主義就是講工農聯盟，工農合作。

sentences.english: We must always hold on to the Marxist- Leninist Principles.
sentences.chinese: 我們必須永遠堅持馬克思列寧主義原則。
